channel.title: Generative Models on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in Generative Models on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Learning Distributions on Manifolds with Free-Form Flows
item.description: Manifold Free-Form Flows (M-FFF) achieves fast and accurate generative modeling on Riemannian manifolds using a single function evaluation, outperforming prior methods.
